junior-lifeguard.title: Junior Lifeguard
junior-lifeguard.target_audience: Pre-lifeguard youth developing water safety awareness
junior-lifeguard.description: Introductory program that builds confidence around water and introduces basic rescue awareness and safety skills. Not a full professional lifeguard certification.
junior-lifeguard.prerequisites: None; comfort in shallow water recommended
junior-lifeguard.age_requirements: Varies by location; confirm with Account Specialist
junior-lifeguard.physical_requirements: Low to moderate; water comfort activities
junior-lifeguard.what_you_learn: Basic water safety, hazard recognition, safe behaviors, intro to rescue awareness

shallow-pool-lifeguard-max-depth-5-ft.title: Shallow Pool Lifeguard (max depth 5 ft.)
shallow-pool-lifeguard-max-depth-5-ft.target_audience: Aspiring lifeguards for shallow pools up to 5 ft depth
shallow-pool-lifeguard-max-depth-5-ft.description: Professional lifeguard certification focused on surveillance and rescue in shallow-water pool environments.
shallow-pool-lifeguard-max-depth-5-ft.prerequisites: Strong swimming skills; ability to perform water rescues
shallow-pool-lifeguard-max-depth-5-ft.age_requirements: Varies by state; typically high school age or older
shallow-pool-lifeguard-max-depth-5-ft.physical_requirements: High; sustained swimming and rescue drills
shallow-pool-lifeguard-max-depth-5-ft.what_you_learn: Surveillance, rescues, spinal care, victim assessment, CPR/AED, First Aid for shallow pools

shallow-pool-lifeguard-max-depth-5-ft-yo.title: Shallow Pool Lifeguard (max depth 5 ft.) + Youth Camp
shallow-pool-lifeguard-max-depth-5-ft-yo.target_audience: Lifeguards working at camps with shallow pools
shallow-pool-lifeguard-max-depth-5-ft-yo.description: Shallow pool lifeguard certification with added youth camp compliance and supervision considerations.
shallow-pool-lifeguard-max-depth-5-ft-yo.age_requirements: Varies by state; confirm with Account Specialist
shallow-pool-lifeguard-max-depth-5-ft-yo.what_you_learn: All shallow pool lifeguard skills plus camp supervision, ratios, documentation and compliance topics

swimming-pool-lifeguard-max-depth-12-ft.title: Swimming Pool Lifeguard (max depth 12 ft.)
swimming-pool-lifeguard-max-depth-12-ft.target_audience: Lifeguards for standard pools up to 12 ft
swimming-pool-lifeguard-max-depth-12-ft.description: Comprehensive lifeguard training for deeper pool environments including deep-end surveillance and rescues.
swimming-pool-lifeguard-max-depth-12-ft.what_you_learn: Deep-water surveillance, submerged victim rescues, CPR/AED, First Aid, spinal management

swimming-pool-lifeguard-max-depth-12-ft-.title: Swimming Pool Lifeguard (max depth 12 ft.) + Youth Camp
swimming-pool-lifeguard-max-depth-12-ft-.target_audience: Pool lifeguards assigned to youth camps
swimming-pool-lifeguard-max-depth-12-ft-.description: Swimming pool lifeguard certification with camp-focused supervision, documentation, and compliance training.
swimming-pool-lifeguard-max-depth-12-ft-.what_you_learn: Pool lifeguard curriculum plus camp policies, supervision ratios, forms and reporting

deep-pool-lifeguard-max-depth-20-ft.title: Deep Pool Lifeguard (max depth 20 ft.)
deep-pool-lifeguard-max-depth-20-ft.target_audience: Lifeguards working in facilities with deep wells or diving areas
deep-pool-lifeguard-max-depth-20-ft.description: Advanced pool lifeguard training for facilities up to 20 ft, including submerged and high-risk rescues.
deep-pool-lifeguard-max-depth-20-ft.prerequisites: Excellent swimming ability and deep-water proficiency
deep-pool-lifeguard-max-depth-20-ft.what_you_learn: High-risk surveillance, submerged victim recovery, advanced rescues, CPR/AED, First Aid

deep-pool-lifeguard-max-depth-20-ft-yout.title: Deep Pool Lifeguard (max depth 20 ft.) + Youth Camp
deep-pool-lifeguard-max-depth-20-ft-yout.target_audience: Camp lifeguards at deep pool facilities
deep-pool-lifeguard-max-depth-20-ft-yout.description: Deep pool lifeguard certification plus camp-specific supervision and compliance training.
deep-pool-lifeguard-max-depth-20-ft-yout.prerequisites: Excellent swimming ability and deep-water proficiency
deep-pool-lifeguard-max-depth-20-ft-yout.what_you_learn: All deep pool skills plus camp policies, ratios, documentation and incident management

waterfront-lifeguard.title: Waterfront Lifeguard
waterfront-lifeguard.target_audience: Lifeguards at lakes, bays, quiet beaches or open water waterfronts
waterfront-lifeguard.description: Open-water lifeguard certification covering currents, visibility challenges, entries, and environmental hazards.
waterfront-lifeguard.prerequisites: Strong open-water swimming and comfort in variable conditions
waterfront-lifeguard.what_you_learn: Open-water surveillance, entries/exits, currents, environmental hazards, rescues, CPR/AED, First Aid

waterfront-lifeguard-youth-camp.title: Waterfront Lifeguard + Youth Camp
waterfront-lifeguard-youth-camp.target_audience: Waterfront lifeguards working at youth camps
waterfront-lifeguard-youth-camp.description: Waterfront lifeguard certification with camp supervision, policy, and compliance training.
waterfront-lifeguard-youth-camp.what_you_learn: Waterfront rescues, hazard management, plus camp ratios, documentation, and risk controls

water-park-lifeguard.title: Water Park Lifeguard
water-park-lifeguard.target_audience: Lifeguards at water parks and aquatic attractions
water-park-lifeguard.description: Specialized training for slides, wave pools, lazy rivers, and high-throughput aquatic attractions.
water-park-lifeguard.what_you_learn: Attraction-specific surveillance, high-crowd response, extractions, CPR/AED, First Aid

water-park-lifeguard-youth-camp.title: Water Park Lifeguard + Youth Camp
water-park-lifeguard-youth-camp.target_audience: Water park lifeguards supervising youth groups/camps
water-park-lifeguard-youth-camp.description: Water park lifeguarding with added youth supervision and camp compliance components.
water-park-lifeguard-youth-camp.what_you_learn: Water park rescues, crowd control, plus youth supervision, ratios, and documentation

lifeguard-with-all-specialities.title: Lifeguard with All Specialities
lifeguard-with-all-specialities.description: Comprehensive training spanning pool, waterfront, and water park environments for maximum versatility.
lifeguard-with-all-specialities.prerequisites: Strong swimming; adaptable to multiple environments
lifeguard-with-all-specialities.what_you_learn: Integrated surveillance/rescue skills across pool, waterfront, and water park settings; CPR/AED, First Aid

lifeguard-recertification-renewal.title: Lifeguard Recertification / Renewal
lifeguard-recertification-renewal.target_audience: Current or recently expired lifeguards needing renewal
lifeguard-recertification-renewal.description: Update and verify lifeguard skills, CPR/AED and First Aid to maintain active certification.
lifeguard-recertification-renewal.prerequisites: Prior lifeguard certification (active or within allowable grace period)
lifeguard-recertification-renewal.what_you_learn: Skills refresh, scenario testing, CPR/AED, First Aid updates and validations

lifeguard-instructor.title: Lifeguard Instructor
lifeguard-instructor.target_audience: Experienced lifeguards seeking to teach and certify others
lifeguard-instructor.description: Prepares candidates to instruct and evaluate lifeguard courses and issue certifications.
lifeguard-instructor.prerequisites: Strong lifeguard skills; prior lifeguard certification required
lifeguard-instructor.physical_requirements: High during skill demos; moderate for teaching
lifeguard-instructor.what_you_learn: Teaching methods, evaluation standards, course administration, documentation, QA

lifeguard-instructor-recertification-ren.title: Lifeguard Instructor Recertification / Renewal
lifeguard-instructor-recertification-ren.description: Renews authorization to teach and certify lifeguard candidates.
lifeguard-instructor-recertification-ren.prerequisites: Current or recently expired Lifeguard Instructor status
lifeguard-instructor-recertification-ren.what_you_learn: Updates to curriculum, evaluation standards, policy changes, QA compliance

lifeguard-instructor-trainer-pre-requisi.title: Lifeguard Instructor Trainer (pre-requisite Lifeguard Instructor)
lifeguard-instructor-trainer-pre-requisi.target_audience: Experienced LGI seeking to train and certify instructors
lifeguard-instructor-trainer-pre-requisi.description: Authorizes candidates to train and certify Lifeguard Instructors (LGI).
lifeguard-instructor-trainer-pre-requisi.what_you_learn: Train-the-trainer methods, mentoring, instructor evaluation, program QA and oversight

lifeguard-instructor-trainer-recertifica.title: Lifeguard Instructor Trainer Recertification / Renewal
lifeguard-instructor-trainer-recertifica.description: Maintains authority to train and certify Lifeguard Instructors.
lifeguard-instructor-trainer-recertifica.what_you_learn: Program updates, instructor QA, evaluation refinements, documentation standards

water-safety-swim-instructor.title: Water Safety Swim Instructor
water-safety-swim-instructor.target_audience: Individuals who want to teach swim lessons and water safety
water-safety-swim-instructor.description: Prepares candidates to plan and teach swim lessons and basic water safety to the public.
water-safety-swim-instructor.what_you_learn: Lesson planning, progressions, safety oversight, evaluation and feedback methods

water-safety-swim-instructor-recertifica.title: Water Safety Swim Instructor Recertification / Renewal
water-safety-swim-instructor-recertifica.description: Updates and renews authorization to teach swim lessons and water safety.
water-safety-swim-instructor-recertifica.what_you_learn: Curriculum updates, safety protocols, instructional best practices

water-safety-swim-instructor-trainer-pre.title: Water Safety Swim Instructor Trainer (pre-requisite Water Safety Swim Instructor)
water-safety-swim-instructor-trainer-pre.target_audience: Experienced WSI aiming to certify WSIs
water-safety-swim-instructor-trainer-pre.description: Authorizes the candidate to train and certify Water Safety Swim Instructors.
water-safety-swim-instructor-trainer-pre.prerequisites: Pre-requisite: active Water Safety Swim Instructor (WSI)
water-safety-swim-instructor-trainer-pre.what_you_learn: Train-the-trainer pedagogy, evaluation, QA, course administration

water-safety-swim-instructor-trainer-rec.title: Water Safety Swim Instructor Trainer Recertification / Renewal
water-safety-swim-instructor-trainer-rec.description: Maintains the authority to train and certify WSIs.
water-safety-swim-instructor-trainer-rec.what_you_learn: Program updates, evaluation refinements, QA documentation

water-safety-swim-instructor-trainer-dir.title: Water Safety Swim Instructor Trainer Director (pre-requisite Water Safety Swim Instructor Trainer)
water-safety-swim-instructor-trainer-dir.description: Prepares leaders to oversee and manage WSIT programs, QA, and regional standards.
water-safety-swim-instructor-trainer-dir.prerequisites: Pre-requisite: active Water Safety Swim Instructor Trainer (WSIT)
water-safety-swim-instructor-trainer-dir.what_you_learn: Program leadership, oversight, QA governance, mentor frameworks

water-safety-swim-instructor-trainer-dir.title: Water Safety Swim Instructor Trainer Director Recertification / Renewal
water-safety-swim-instructor-trainer-dir.description: Maintains status to supervise WSIT programs and ensure QA.
water-safety-swim-instructor-trainer-dir.what_you_learn: Governance updates, QA metrics, regional oversight practices

basic-water-safety.title: Basic Water Safety
basic-water-safety.description: Fundamental water safety awarenessâ€”ideal for anyone supervising others around water. No swimming ability required.
basic-water-safety.age_requirements: Open to most ages; confirm locally
basic-water-safety.what_you_learn: Water safety rules, hazard recognition, safer behaviors, simple assist techniques

basic-water-safety-recertification-renew.title: Basic Water Safety Recertification / Renewal
basic-water-safety-recertification-renew.target_audience: Individuals renewing basic water safety training
basic-water-safety-recertification-renew.description: Refreshes core safety knowledge and hazard awareness for non-professional settings.
basic-water-safety-recertification-renew.prerequisites: Prior Basic Water Safety course recommended
basic-water-safety-recertification-renew.age_requirements: Open to most ages; confirm locally
basic-water-safety-recertification-renew.what_you_learn: Updated safety guidelines, situational awareness, prevention strategies

bls-cpr-for-healthcare-provider.title: BLS CPR for Healthcare Provider
bls-cpr-for-healthcare-provider.description: Professional-level CPR with AED for adult/child/infant in clinical and rescue settings.
bls-cpr-for-healthcare-provider.physical_requirements: Moderate; requires chest compressions and floor work
bls-cpr-for-healthcare-provider.what_you_learn: High-quality CPR, AED use, team response, choking relief, basic life support algorithms

cpr-recertification-renewal.title: CPR Recertification / Renewal
cpr-recertification-renewal.description: Refreshes CPR/AED skills for adult/child/infant to maintain readiness.
cpr-recertification-renewal.prerequisites: Prior CPR certification (active or recently expired)
cpr-recertification-renewal.what_you_learn: Latest CPR standards, AED operation, performance tuning and updates

first-aid.title: First Aid
first-aid.description: Covers recognition and immediate care for common illnesses and injuries.
first-aid.age_requirements: Open to most ages; confirm locally
first-aid.what_you_learn: Scene safety, bleeding control, shock, burns, fractures, medical emergencies basics

first-aid-recertification-renewal.title: First Aid Recertification / Renewal
first-aid-recertification-renewal.description: Updates knowledge and practice for immediate first aid response.
first-aid-recertification-renewal.age_requirements: Open to most ages; confirm locally
first-aid-recertification-renewal.what_you_learn: Latest protocols for wounds, burns, fractures, environmental and medical emergencies

bls-cpr-for-healthcare-provider-and-firs.title: BLS CPR for Healthcare Provider & First Aid
bls-cpr-for-healthcare-provider-and-firs.target_audience: Healthcare providers and professional rescuers needing CPR + First Aid
bls-cpr-for-healthcare-provider-and-firs.description: Combined certification covering professional CPR/AED plus core First Aid response.
bls-cpr-for-healthcare-provider-and-firs.what_you_learn: High-quality CPR, AED use, choking relief, plus bleeding, shock, injury care basics

bls-cpr-for-healthcare-provider-and-firs.title: BLS CPR for Healthcare Provider & First Aid Recertification / Renewal
bls-cpr-for-healthcare-provider-and-firs.target_audience: Providers renewing combined CPR + First Aid
bls-cpr-for-healthcare-provider-and-firs.description: Keeps professional CPR and First Aid skills current and validated.
bls-cpr-for-healthcare-provider-and-firs.what_you_learn: Updated CPR/AED protocols, team dynamics, and First Aid best practices

bls-cpr-for-healthcare-provider-and-firs.title: BLS CPR for Healthcare Provider & First Aid Instructor
bls-cpr-for-healthcare-provider-and-firs.target_audience: Experienced responders who will teach CPR & First Aid
bls-cpr-for-healthcare-provider-and-firs.description: Authorizes individuals to teach and certify CPR and First Aid to others.
bls-cpr-for-healthcare-provider-and-firs.prerequisites: Strong CPR/First Aid skills; prior certification required
bls-cpr-for-healthcare-provider-and-firs.what_you_learn: Teaching methods, skills evaluation, course setup, documentation and QA

bls-cpr-for-healthcare-provider-and-firs.title: BLS CPR for Healthcare Provider & First Aid Instructor Recertification / Renewal
bls-cpr-for-healthcare-provider-and-firs.target_audience: Instructors renewing authority to teach CPR & First Aid
bls-cpr-for-healthcare-provider-and-firs.description: Updates instructor authorization and teaching standards.
bls-cpr-for-healthcare-provider-and-firs.prerequisites: Current or recently expired instructor status
bls-cpr-for-healthcare-provider-and-firs.what_you_learn: Curriculum updates, evaluation refinements, QA procedures

bls-cpr-for-healthcare-provider-and-firs.title: BLS CPR for Healthcare Provider & First Aid Instructor Trainer (pre-requisite BLS CPR & First Aid Instructor)
bls-cpr-for-healthcare-provider-and-firs.target_audience: Experienced instructors who will train new instructors
bls-cpr-for-healthcare-provider-and-firs.description: Authorizes the candidate to train and certify CPR & First Aid Instructors.
bls-cpr-for-healthcare-provider-and-firs.prerequisites: Pre-requisite: active CPR & First Aid Instructor
bls-cpr-for-healthcare-provider-and-firs.what_you_learn: Instructor development, mentoring, evaluation standards, QA oversight

bls-cpr-for-healthcare-provider-and-firs.title: BLS CPR for Healthcare Provider & First Aid Instructor Trainer Recertification / Renewal
bls-cpr-for-healthcare-provider-and-firs.description: Maintains authority to train and certify CPR & First Aid Instructors.
bls-cpr-for-healthcare-provider-and-firs.prerequisites: Current or recently expired Instructor Trainer
bls-cpr-for-healthcare-provider-and-firs.what_you_learn: Program updates, QA improvements, instructor evaluation refinements

bloodborne-pathogens.title: Bloodborne Pathogens
bloodborne-pathogens.description: Covers exposure risks, controls, PPE, and post-exposure procedures for bloodborne pathogens.
bloodborne-pathogens.what_you_learn: Exposure control plans, PPE use, cleanup, reporting and medical follow-up

oxygen-administrator.title: Oxygen Administrator
oxygen-administrator.target_audience: Responders who may administer emergency oxygen
oxygen-administrator.description: Teaches safe setup and administration of emergency oxygen in first aid scenarios.
oxygen-administrator.what_you_learn: Cylinder handling, delivery devices, indications/contraindications, documentation

oxygen-administrator-instructor.title: Oxygen Administrator Instructor
oxygen-administrator-instructor.target_audience: Qualified responders who will teach oxygen administration
oxygen-administrator-instructor.description: Prepares instructors to teach oxygen administration safely and effectively.
oxygen-administrator-instructor.prerequisites: Oxygen Administrator experience; CPR/First Aid recommended
oxygen-administrator-instructor.what_you_learn: Teaching methodology, skills evaluation, course administration and QA

oxygen-administrator-instructor-recertif.title: Oxygen Administrator Instructor Recertification / Renewal
oxygen-administrator-instructor-recertif.target_audience: Current Oxygen Administrator Instructors renewing status
oxygen-administrator-instructor-recertif.description: Updates instructor authorization and course standards.
oxygen-administrator-instructor-recertif.prerequisites: Current or recently expired Oxygen Administrator Instructor
oxygen-administrator-instructor-recertif.what_you_learn: Curriculum updates, evaluation standards, QA practices

certified-pool-operator-cpo.title: Certified Pool Operator (CPO)
certified-pool-operator-cpo.target_audience: Pool managers, operators, and maintenance staff
certified-pool-operator-cpo.description: Nationally recognized certification covering pool operation, water chemistry, safety and compliance. Fully online.
certified-pool-operator-cpo.what_you_learn: Water chemistry, filtration, code compliance, recordkeeping, risk management
